subject: Re: Prob. in extending TestCase class
msgSnippet: I believe that is normal, with or without extending: setUp and tearDown get called for every test method. Makes sense conceptually if you think about it: each
messageBody:
I believe that is normal, with or without extending: setUp and
tearDown get called for every test method. Makes sense conceptually
if you think about it: each method is an entire test unto itself, and
so needs its own setup.
r:b:

--- In junit@yahoogroups.com, "joshi_pranav_p" <pranav_p_joshi@i...>
wrote:
> Hi,
> I am using Junit Framwork for Testing our java product. we have
> created 5 testXXX method to test diff. functionality. for all the
> method some API call is required,that we have difine in setUp()
which
> is same for all 5 testXXX method. now whenever i run the case It
> create 5 diff. object of the class and it is calling 5 time setUp()
> method for each textXXX call.
>
> Can we do it in single call ? How ?
>
> Thanks in advance,
> Pranav.
